description: Prime Minister Justin Trudeau of Canada said on Tuesday that his government had “every reason to believe” that a Canadian held hostage in the Philippines had been killed by his captors.
title: Trudeau Speaks on Hostage Death
title_page: Trudeau Speaks on Hostage Death - Video - NYTimes.com
text: Prime Minister Justin Trudeau of Canada said on Tuesday that his government had “every reason to believe” that a Canadian held hostage in the Philippines had been killed by his captors.
